bpi.most.client.modules.charts

Interface ChartInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChartWrapper, HighchartStandart

    public interface ChartInterface
    Interface for all functions a chart window must implement

      • setDataset

        void setDataset(bpi.most.shared.DpDataset dpdataset,
              boolean periodicFlag)
        Method to set a complete new data set to a series.
        Parameters:
        dpdataset - The data set you want to replace the old data with.
        periodicFlag - Set to true if the new data is periodic and set to false if the new data is real time data.

      • getPointCount

        int getPointCount(java.lang.String name)
        Method to get the Number of points of a specific series in the chart, returns zero when the series is not in the chart.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the series you want to know how many points it have.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of points the series have. Zero when the series is not in the chart.

      • setPeriodicFlag

        void setPeriodicFlag(java.lang.String name,
                   boolean flag)
        Method to set the periodic flag of a series. The periodic flag indicate if the data of the series is real time or periodic generated.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the series you want to set the flag.
        flag -

      • getPeriodicFlag

        boolean getPeriodicFlag(java.lang.String name)
        Method to get the state of the periodic flag of a series. The periodic flag indicate if the data of the series is real time or periodic generated.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the series you want to get the flag.
        Returns:
        Returns if the data of the series is real time or periodic generated. True = periodic generated data, false = real time data

      • isInChart

        boolean isInChart(java.lang.String name)
        Methode to check if series with given name already exist in the chart.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the series you want to know if it's in the chart.
        Returns:
        Returns if the series with the given name is already in chart. True = is in chart, false = is not in chart

      • isPeriodic

        boolean isPeriodic()
        Method to figure out if there is periodic data is used in any series.
        Returns:
        Return true if any series contains periodic Values and false if all series contains only real time data.

      • getZoomStart

        java.util.Date getZoomStart()
        If the chart has a zoom feature you can get the start date and time of the zoom frame.
        Returns:
        The start date and time of the zoom frame.

      • getZoomEnd

        java.util.Date getZoomEnd()
        If the chart has a zoom feature you can get the end date and time of the zoom frame.
        Returns:
        The end date and time of the zoom frame.

      • showLoading

        void showLoading(java.lang.String text)
        Shows a loading icon on the chart until it's removed with hideLoading().
        Parameters:
        text - The text to be shown while loading.

      • hideLoading

        void hideLoading()
        Hides the loading icon that is shown with showLoading(text).
